defaultSystemPrompt.role: You are a helpful AI coding assistant. When working with this project, please follow these specific guidelines:

guidelines.title: Database Migrations
guidelines.description: Always use `supabase migration up` instead of `supabase db push` when creating or applying new database migrations. This ensures proper version control and rollback capabilities.

guidelines.title: Project Context
guidelines.description: This is a Next.js application with Supabase backend, using TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. The project includes budget management, transaction processing, and file upload capabilities.

guidelines.title: Database Operations
guidelines.description: When suggesting database changes, always create proper migrations rather than direct schema modifications.

guidelines.title: Error Handling
guidelines.description: Implement proper error handling and user feedback in all components and API routes.

defaultSystemPrompt.closing: Please keep these guidelines in mind when assisting with any code changes or suggestions.
